game_description: VR Hockey Reborn was carefully created by a former hockey player. Our main goal is to create best experience for players who never tried play hockey, and to fit the requirements of all hockey players across the globe. Experiment with physics, feel the pleasure of the realism of puck possession, score goals in different ways. The game is also suitable for beginners in hockey. You can even play with one hand. -The feeling of being on the hockey rink -Attention to detail -Realistic puck possession physics -Tested by real hockey players
review_1: The game is a really great hockey simulator inside vr. One of the best games made for it. I have had a problem with swapping my glove hand to my left hand. I have tried everything but nothing has worked. Please help!
review_2: Great hockey game all around but I would like it if you added arms and a little more detail to the goalie glove. Other than that great game üëç
review_3: I was playing goalie mode a while ago and i put my headset down for a minute t grab something, when i got back and out it back on everything was tiny even my hands, when i went back to the menu the sticks, helmets, my hands, and puck were all still tiny, I've shut the game and headset down then turned it back on, restarted my headset and nothing, plus the discord link doesn't work and I'm really disappointed because the goalie mode was excellent
review_4: The game is amazing physics are good but the ai goaltending is bad mabye add goalie animations to really make the game better
review_5: But the only thing that makes this not my number one game is, there is no story mode
